document_data.mainbody:
The Mines of Sarbreen is a one-round adventure module set in the Living City organized play program. It is the seventh installment of the Living Citys High Level Underdark Campaign and the first part of its Illithid Trilogy. It was published in 1999 and is intended for a group of adventurers of any levels.While this adventure was not labeled as being the start of a trilogy when it was published, the authors later module A Meeting of Brains would retroactively label it as such.
